data.name: scrollBehavior
data.description: Behavior when scrolling (e.g., fixed/shrink/hide)

data.name: scrollAmountToShrink
data.description: Scroll distance (px) before navbar shrinks

data.name: scrollAmountToHide
data.description: Scroll distance (px) before navbar hides

data.name: height
data.description: Height of the navbar. Accepts predefined values or custom height classes.

data.name: navBreakpoint
data.description: Responsive breakpoint for collapse behavior ('sm' | 'md' | 'lg' | 'xl')

data.name: animationSpeed
data.description: Transition speed for animations of the Navbar and all the components inside it.

data.name: rounded
data.description: Controls border radius size of the Navbar and its components.

data.name: ariaLabel
data.description: ARIA label for accessibility

data.name: dropdownEvent
data.description: Dropdown trigger event applied all the Navbar dropdown.

data.name: navInnerClasses
data.description: Custom CSS classes for the inner navbar container

data.name: navCollapseClasses
data.description: Custom CSS classes for the collapsed navbar state

data.name: scrollShrinkClasses
data.description: Custom CSS classes for the shrunk navbar state

data.name: linkClasses
data.description: Custom CSS classes for navbar links

data.name: activeLinkClasses
data.description: Custom CSS classes for active navbar links

data.name: dropdownLinkClasses
data.description: Custom CSS classes for dropdown links

data.name: class
data.description: Any CSS classes used in the class prop will be applied to the container of the Navbar. It will override the default classes.

data.name: children
data.description: Snippet for the main content of the component.

data.name: href
data.description: URL to navigate to when clicked (usually homepage)

data.name: ariaLabel
data.default: Logo: click to go to homepage
data.description: ARIA label for accessibility (describes the brand link)

data.name: class
data.description: Any CSS classes used in the class prop will be applied to the van link. It will override the default classes.

data.name: children
data.description: Snippet for the main content of the component.

data.name: children
data.description: Snippet for the main content of the component.

data.name: toggleIcon
data.description: Custom icon for the collapse toggle button. If provided, default icon will be replaced.

data.name: label
data.description: Dropdown trigger label (text or custom content)

data.name: align
data.description: Menu alignment ('start' | 'end')

data.name: width
data.description: Dropdown width (responsive or full-width)

data.name: triggerEvent
data.description: Dropdown trigger behavior ('hover' | 'click')

data.name: animation
data.description: Menu open/close animation ('fade' | 'slide' | 'zoom')

data.name: arrowIcon
data.description: Custom arrow icon (Snippet) or visibility toggle (boolean)

data.name: linkClasses
data.description: Custom CSS classes for dropdown links

data.name: class
data.description: Any CSS classes used in the class prop will be applied to the container of the navbar dropdown. It will override the default classes.

data.name: children
data.description: Snippet for the main content of the component.

data.name: text
data.description: Link text (alternative to using children slot)

data.name: active
data.description: Controls active state (boolean) or adds a custom active class (string)

data.name: class
data.description: Any CSS classes used in the class prop will be applied to the container of the nav link. It will override the default classes.

data.name: children
data.description: Snippet for the main content of the component.

data.name: align
data.description: Horizontal alignment of the link group ('start' | 'end' | 'center')

data.name: class
data.description: Any CSS classes used in the class prop will be applied to the container of the nav link. It will override the default classes.

data.name: children
data.description: Snippet for the main content of the component.
